summary: Unsupervised approach: TextRank Another keyphrase extraction algorithm is TextRank.
TextRank and LexRank The unsupervised approach to summarization is also quite similar in spirit to unsupervised keyphrase extraction and gets around the issue of costly training data.
LexRank is an algorithm essentially identical to TextRank, and both use this approach for document summarization.
In both LexRank and TextRank, a graph is constructed by creating a vertex for each sentence in the document.
Unlike TextRank, LexRank has been applied to multi-document summarization.
